resources.string: if you are good at something, never do it for free
A man who does not spend time with his family can never be a real man
Do not compare yourself to others. If you do so, you are insulting yourself
In this world, there are no good or bad people, only power and those too weak to seek it
In a meeting,the loudest name is often the easiest to extinguish. But be cautious of the one who remains silent throughout and types quietly on the table - that is the one you should watch out for
